author: wrowe
msg: Kill two bugs with one stone;
* Ensure that USER must preceed PASS
* Ensure that USER failing the FTPOptions RequireSSL test
won't permit a PASS to succeed.

author: sebor
msg: * bin/xcomp.awk (sectcomponents): Added an array of lists of component
names for each section with each list maintaining the same order as

in each table in the same order as they appear in the build logs.
